markdown: Box 115 R.D#2 Harveys Lake, Pa. 16618 May 2, 1975. Council for Agricultural Science and Technology Agronomy Department Iowa State University Ames, Iowa 50010 Gentlemen: I am a sophomore at Lake Lehman High School. Because of inevitable circum- stances on National Food Day I was un- able to phone you to ask you a question. The question I was meaning to ask was, 'Why did the price of sugar happen to go up considerably right before the Christ- mas baking season. There was not a great shortage, as was told the consumers. Now sugar is in supply like before, so why hasn't the cost decreased? Any answer you could give to this problem would be greatly appreciated. <::attestation: Signature Signature: legible Readable Text: Yours truly, Sharon Evans Short description: Handwritten closing and signature.::> Source: https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/docs/syjk0226

chunks.markdown: Box 115 R.D#2 Harveys Lake, Pa. 16618 May 2, 1975.
Council for Agricultural Science and Technology Agronomy Department Iowa State University Ames, Iowa 50010

Gentlemen: I am a sophomore at Lake Lehman High School. Because of inevitable circum- stances on National Food Day I was un- able to phone you to ask you a question. The question I was meaning to ask was, 'Why did the price of sugar happen to go up considerably right before the Christ- mas baking season. There was not a great shortage, as was told the consumers. Now sugar is in supply like before, so why hasn't the cost decreased? Any answer you could give to this problem would be greatly appreciated.
<::attestation: Signature Signature: legible Readable Text: Yours truly, Sharon Evans Short description: Handwritten closing and signature.::>
